game.name: Unseen
game.shortDescription: It’s an indie horror game where John, a forensic photographer, after an unexpected and exhausting shift, is forced to spend the night away from home. What seemed like a temporary rest soon begins to turn unsettling.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It’s an indie horror game where John, a forensic photographer, after an unexpected and exhausting shift, is forced to spend the night away from home. What seemed like a temporary rest soon begins to turn unsettling.

reviewHighlights.text: This game is a whole lot better than this developers last game, c.u.t.s. C.u.t.s Drove me up a wall.
